We don't support open report design files use eclipse open file action.
In BIRT 2.1 RCP, thers is only one 'Open file' menu, but in BIRT 2.2 RCP there are two. I think it may caused by BIRT 2.2 RCP include eclipse IDE platform. 

Maybe we should find a solution to hide the second 'Open file' menu contributed from eclipse platform.

org.eclipse.ui.ide is a dependency of org.eclipse.ui.editors, and org.eclipse.ui.editors is a required bundle by org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.lib and org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.editors.schematic etc.

So it can not be simply removed by build team. Please check dependency of MANIFEST. If they can not be marked as "optional" dependency, this bug has to be marked as wont fix for now.

I have read the code. The reason is for highlighting and locating the error line. Move these features form the internal xml editor to the WTP xml editor integration page. 
The RCP build will only contains a plain text xml source page. For IDE build, if the WTP xml editor included, the user can get full feature of xml source editor.
GUI have removed the dependency of org.eclipse.ui.editors and org.eclipse.ui.ide, please check to confirm and make new build of RCP.
